blocks.content:
# Welcome to the Digital Experience Monitoring Onboarding Launchpad
This launchpad is your gateway to mastering Dynatrace DEM capabilities, enabling you to deliver flawless digital experiences across web, mobile, and IoT channels. By leveraging Real User Monitoring (RUM), Synthetic Monitoring, and Session Replay, you gain deep visibility into user journeys, performance bottlenecks, and conversion paths. DEM empowers teams to proactively detect issues, optimize application performance, and enhance customer satisfaction. Whether you’re focused on troubleshooting, release validation, or conversion optimization, this launchpad provides the resources and best practices to unlock the full value of [Digital Experience Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/dem-landing)!
### Explore our Dynatrace University courses and YouTube playlists to help you getting started

content.title: Digital Experience
content.description: Dive into Dynatrace University's Digital Experience Learning Plan!

content.title: Drive Business Impact with Synthetic Monitoring
content.description: Simulate critical user journeys on your apps using Dynatrace Synthetics to ensure resiliency and performance!

content.title: Dynatrace Essentials: Digital Experience Monitoring
content.description: Explore the concept of user monitoring with a specific focus on how Dynatrace captures data directly from a user’s browser or mobile device.

content.title: Digital Performance 101: Observe, analyze and optimize your End User Experience
content.description: The basics of DEM and how Dynatrace Real User Monitoring provides automated insights into how to optimize the End User Experience.

blocks.content: ### Explore sample use cases via our Dynatrace Blog posts

content.title: 10 Digital Experience Monitoring Best Practices
content.description: Digital experience monitoring (DEM) is crucial for organizations to meet this demand and succeed in today’s competitive digital economy.

content.title: Automate Digital Excellence with Dynatrace Synthetic Monitoring and Workflows
content.description: Dynatrace® Synthetic Monitoring integrated with visual workflows offers a robust solution for maintaining stability and growth.

content.title: How to get the most value out of Session Replay
content.description: Explore use cases and examples of Dynatrace's user session video like playback capabilities. See what your end users see!

blocks.content:
### Documentation
--- 
 
Explore official Dynatrace documentation to access detailed guidance about how Dynatrace Digital Experience Monitoring (DEM) provides availability and performance monitoring to help ensure that your applications and services are available, functional, fast, and efficient across all channels, including mobile, web, IoT, and APIs.
[DEM Hub](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/dem-landing)
* Begin your journey at the documentation hub for all things Digital Experience Monitoring. From there you can drill into what matters to you!
* [Real User Monitoring Concepts](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/digital-experience/rum-concepts)
  * Real User Monitoring (RUM) is one of the two fundamental constituents of Digital Experience Monitoring (DEM), the other one being Synthetic. Learn the basic concepts behind RUM!
* [Web Applications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/web-applications-landing)
  * Dive into Web application performance monitoring including information on the initial setup, troubleshooting and how to analyse your user session data.
* [Mobile Applications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/mobile-applications-landing)
  * Learn how to Instrument your Android, iOS, Hrbid and cross-platform Mobile Apps.
* [Custom Applications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/custom-applications-landing)
  * Using non-standard web or mobile apps? Learn how you can still gain observability into your rich client apps, IoT Apps and more!
* [User Session Segmentation](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/user-sessions-landing)
  * Effective user session segmentation is the key to understanding how individual users who share common characteristics experience your application. Learn how to segment your user session data so you can focus on what matters.
* [Session Replay](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/session-replay)
  * Learn how you can record your customers' interactions with your application and replay each click or tap in a movie-like experience. See what your users see!
* [Synthetic Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/synthetic-hub)
  * Just because your web application is accessible from your office and runs great on your laptop doesn't mean that your customers around the world are also having a great experience with it. Therefore, it's imperative to ensure constant availability and performance of your application from your users' point of view with Dynatrace Synthetic Monitoring!

blocks.content:
### Frequently Asked Questions
**What do I do if I need help managing my Dynatrace environment?**
* There are numerous support resources available to all Dynatrace users. Select the "Support" button in the bottom left of the navigation menu to access all our available support resources including:
  * Support Center
  * Documentation
  * Community
  * University
  * Support Tickets
* We also have a dedicated in-product chat team who can assist you
  * The in product chat is available 24/7 for existing Enterprise Success and Support customers. For standard customers the chat is only available during business hours.
